body_html: Yes, I passed 1 (I was hoping to debug it on a single gpu machine before test it on a multi-gpu one). Changing to OneDeviceStrategy did solve the error in the single machine. I hope to test it on a multi-gpu machine soon. Thanks!
body_text: Yes, I passed 1 (I was hoping to debug it on a single gpu machine before test it on a multi-gpu one). Changing to OneDeviceStrategy  did solve the error in the single machine. I hope to test it on a multi-gpu machine soon. Thanks!
body: Yes, I passed `1` (I was hoping to debug it on a single gpu machine before test it on a multi-gpu one). Changing to `OneDeviceStrategy ` did solve the error in the single machine. I hope to test it on a multi-gpu machine soon. Thanks!
